Line 170: Line 170:
==Controversy==
==Controversy==
Def Jams' distributor, [[Columbia Records]], refused to release the album due to its controversial lyrical themes and cover art.<ref name="An exclusive oral history of Slayer"/> It was eventually distributed by [[Geffen Records]] on [[October 7]], but due to the controversy did not appear on Geffen Record's release schedule.<ref name="An exclusive oral history of Slayer"/>
Def Jams' distributor, [[Columbia Records]], refused to release the album due to its controversial lyrical themes and cover art.<ref name="An exclusive oral history of Slayer"/> It was eventually distributed by [[Geffen Records]] on [[October 7]], but due to the controversy did not appear on Geffen Record's release schedule.<ref name="An exclusive oral history of Slayer"/>
